data.comment: Santa Clara kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Joao Bento awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
Santa Clara to take a throw-in in Guimaraes territory.
In the minute 4, Joao Bento signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Joao Bento signals a Guimaraes throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
Marcus Edwards of Guimaraes is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 8, Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Guimaraes in the half of Santa Clara.
Guimaraes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Santa Clara in Ponta Delgada.
In the minute 11, Joao Bento signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
Throw-in for Guimaraes in their own half.
Throw-in Santa Clara.
In the minute 14, Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 16, Guimaraes's Ola John gets in a shot on goal at Estadio de Sao Miguel. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
Santa Clara needs to be cautious. Guimaraes have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 17, Can Guimaraes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santa Clara's half?
Santa Clara have a goal kick.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 20, Guimaraes have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
Joao Bento signals a Guimaraes throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
Throw-in for Santa Clara at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
In the minute 22, Ball goes out of play for a Santa Clara goal kick.
Santa Clara drive upfield and Thiago Santana gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Guimaraes defender.
Corner awarded to Santa Clara.
In the minute 23, Joao Bento signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Guimaraes have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
Joao Bento signals a throw-in for Guimaraes, close to Santa Clara's area.
In the minute 27, Santa Clara have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Guimaraes in their own half.
Guimaraes are pushing forward but Falaye Sacko's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 29, Goal kick for Santa Clara at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Guimaraes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Santa Clara push forward at Estadio de Sao Miguel and Carlos Carvalho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Guimaraes defence.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Guimaraes close to the penalty box.
Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Guimaraes at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Santa Clara take a 1-0 lead thanks to Thiago Santana.
Carlos Carvalho instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Guimaraes in the half of Santa Clara.
Nene (Santa Clara) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
In the minute 38, Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ze Manuel is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Santa Claraâ€™s Ze Manuel is on his feet again at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Guimaraes just outside Santa Clara's area.
In the minute 40, Joao Bento awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
Santa Clara have been awarded a penalty in Ponta Delgada...
Goal! Carlos Carvalho extends Santa Clara's lead from the spot. They now lead 2-0.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Ponta Delgada.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Guimaraes.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Guimaraes's Ola John gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Santa Clara defender.
In the minute 45, Guimaraes have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 45, Guimaraes are back in the match in Ponta Delgada. Florent Hanin has scored to make it 2-1.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Guimaraes kick-off.
Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
In the minute 46, Anderson Carvalho is replacing Nene for Santa Clara at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 48, Guimaraes to take a throw-in in Santa Clara territory.
Free kick in a good position for Guimaraes!
Pedro Henrique (Guimaraes) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 49, Marcus Edwards of Guimaraes gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ponta Delgada.
Throw-in for Guimaraes close to the penalty box.
In the minute 50, Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Joao Bento awards the away team a throw-in.
Joao Bento signals a throw-in for Guimaraes, close to Santa Clara's area.
In the minute 52, Guimaraes have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
In Ponta Delgada, Mikel Agu (Guimaraes) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Santa Clara at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Santa Clara's Thiago Santana is whistled for offside at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
In the minute 53, Santa Clara make their second substitution with Lincoln replacing Ze Manuel.
Ball goes out of play for a Guimaraes goal kick.
In the minute 55, Throw-in Guimaraes.
Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
Santa Clara have a goal kick.
In the minute 57, Ball safe as Guimaraes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Guimaraes.
Thiago Santana for Santa Clara has been booked by Joao Bento and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Guimaraes at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Joao Bento awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Can Guimaraes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santa Clara's half?
Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
Throw-in high up the field for Guimaraes in Ponta Delgada.
In the minute 63, Joao Bento signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
Denis Poha (Guimaraes) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 64, Santa Clara's Osama Rashid looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Osama Rashid for Santa Clara who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ponta Delgada.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ivo Vieira (Guimaraes) is making a first substitution, with Joao Pedro replacing Denis Poha.
Abou Ouattara is on a sub for Ola John for Guimaraes.
In the minute 68, Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
Free kick Guimaraes.
Penalty! Joao Bento points to the spot, great chance for Guimaraes...
In the minute 71, Andre Andre levels the score at 2-2 from the penalty spot.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Guimaraes.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ponta Delgada.
In the minute 74, Free kick Santa Clara.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Guimaraes.
The home team replace Thiago Santana with Cryzan.
In the minute 76, Guimaraes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 77, Joao Bento signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Santa Clara needs to be cautious. Guimaraes have an attacking throw-in.
In Ponta Delgada Guimaraes's Marcus Edwards is caught offside.
In the minute 79, Joao Bento signals a Guimaraes throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
Free kick for Guimaraes in the half of Santa Clara.
At Estadio de Sao Miguel, Fabio Cardoso for the home team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
In the minute 81, Guimaraes have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 81, Guimaraes's Andre Andre has been booked in Ponta Delgada.
At Estadio de Sao Miguel, Cryzan has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Marcus Edwards (Guimaraes) has received a yellow card from Joao Bento.
Guimaraes have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Santa Clara in Ponta Delgada.
In the minute 83, Santa Clara's Costinha misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Guimaraes goal kick.
Santa Clara to take a throw-in in Guimaraes territory.
In the minute 84, Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Guimaraes have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
Pierre Sagna is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
Pierre Sagna has recovered and rejoins the match in Ponta Delgada.
Joao Bento signals a Santa Clara throw-in in Guimaraes's half.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Guimaraes.
In the minute 87, Joao Henriques (Santa Clara) has taken off Pierre Sagna who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Cesar is the replacement.
Ivo Vieira is making the team's third substitution at Estadio de Sao Miguel with Joseph Amoah replacing Andre Andre.
In the minute 88, Joao Bento signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Fabio Cardoso.
Mamadu (Santa Clara) has been shown a straight red card by referee Joao Bento.
Fabio Cardoso returns to the field for Santa Clara after picking up a slight injury.
At Estadio de Sao Miguel the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Guimaraes to take a throw-in in Santa Clara territory.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Guimaraes.
Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Santa Clara.
Santa Clara have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
Corner awarded to Santa Clara.
Goal kick for Guimaraes at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 2-2.
